post.body: @bradjward Yeah, I used Prime a while back on a free trial. It was very nice, but I'm not sure I order enough to warrant it.
I'm pretty close to 4,000 right now.
We use a Lacie 1TB NAS drive at work with good results. Nice, smallish, simple: http://is.gd/bruA
It's actually mentioned in the form handler doc, I was just using a printed version of it that was older http://is.gd/boAM
Yes! You know it's nonsense now. There is no secret.
That's because you were too busy with this secret nonsense.
I call bull.
I particularly like that 2.7 has built in upgrading (no need for WPAU plugin any more) and built in plugin install. So nice.
There is no #twittersecret, there is only Zool.
That's the dumbest book marketing I have ever seen.
I'm Cingular/AT&T. But no big deal, managed to get my phone working again, at least well enough to be usable.
That's the failiest spelling of orange ever.
Man, I could feed a small African villiage for a month on taht.
The bill is my worry, getting feedback on what people pay monthly. And no 3G here, correct.
@bobtv What does your monthly bill run total?
What kind of cell phone do you use these days?
How does that compare to when you got it?
Yeah, that's what Google is informing me of. Oh well, would have been tempting since 95% of my day is around computers anyway.
I hate to tell you this, but that's no dream.
So-to-speak. Lions had the first 16 game winless season. 0-16. Oh and sixteen. Owen 16.
Did you just play on Battle.net?
Yeah, plus it's one of the few games all of us like. It turns out it's harder than I anticipated.
Starting to watch Star Trek Voyager. About to start the 6th episode. I don't understand why The Doctor needs to do "paperwork."
Amazon now has a toolbar that loads on pages when you're logged in to your Associate account w/ fast links to share items, very nice.
So, Firefox keeps crashing, quite randomly. About 8 times so far today.
If I order something on Amazon today, do you think it will get here in time for Christmas via standard shipping?
Pictures of my new Cold Steel Spike: http://is.gd/bqnn
WCAG 2.0 is finally out. This should be fun.
Some guy my friend knows online just sent her a Macbook for Christmas. Creepy, right?
Our form is now captcha'd
I do not believe in the #twittersecret.
Got my Cold Steel Spike in the post today. Very small, very sharp.
Fallout of the phone incident: lost a 600,000 point score in bedazzled. Oh well, my Razr is still a tank.
Holy crap I just fixed my cell phone! No new cell phone for me!
Maybe I'll just order a cheap Chinese iPhone clone until something better comes along.
If I get the iPhone, I could sell my iPod Nano to pay for part of it...
I'm really having a hard time deciding what phone to get to replace mine.
Anyone got recommendations on a nice Wordpress + Forum integration scheme?
First review I saw for The Wrestler gave it 10/10: http://is.gd/cesm
iPhone owners: what has your experience with battery lifespan been like, I'm concerned that it's not user replaceable.
Hot damn, refurb 16GB iPhone for $250
Does anyone have any experience porting a cell phone number to Skype? Is it even possible?
So, what do I replace my cell phone with? Time to go full Skype?
Well... it's sort of working, the screen is definitely gone though.
Not that I'm judging. But come on, the networks aren't even trying for "reality" anymore.
Michaele is watching Mamma's Boys. All these girls look like total tramps.
Really hating that my fiancee made over $3400 this year, can't claim her as a dependent.
I think by this summer I'm gonna invest in a new laptop. I think that time has come.
Looks like the Watchmen movie is in some serious trouble. Stupid Fox, you had your chance, tough.
Viewport theme for Wordpress - very cool: http://labs.paulicio.us/viewport/
Wal-Mart is now selling the iPhone.
Breaking in the Diablo 2 server. Seems to be working nicely now. Pain in the ass to get working but well worth it. Man this is a great game.
Thanks everyone for checking. Hacking on some port forwarding on my box @ home, wanted to make sure I wasn't breaking things to the outside.
Can I get a confirmation that this page is coming up for people: http://www.fienen.net/kplaylist
Oh how tempting this is: http://is.gd/dWdD
YES! Got the Diablo 2 server up and running.
Back to being stuck on this Diablo 2 server after almost getting it going.
So I'm finding setting up a Diablo 2 server to be substantially more frustrating than I had anticipated.
Wow, the Cowboys apparently forgot that this is the last game of the season.
Jesus, Pizza Hut wants $2.50 for a fricking 2 litre bottle of pop.
